transcript:
Customer: Hello


Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha ji sir namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar kaun?
Customer: Sir Ujjwal baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Executive: Yaar Ujjwal ji main kaha baad mein baat karunga bhai please itna time nahi rehta aap samjho meri baat.
Executive: Sir aap nahi woh baat theek hai sir ek baat mere ko ye bataye sir main sir aapne customer care pe call kari thi kya? Kyunki aapke naam se na issue raise hua hai matlab ticket raise hua hai to us recording call ki thi.
Customer: Sir main baad mein karunga abhi mere ko khud dhyan nahi kuch bhi.
Executive: Thodi der rukiye. To abhi main close kar du sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called regarding a ticket raised.

- Customer said he will call later.



Resolution:

- Executive asked if he should close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, customer care, call
